query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Report on revision of project results and methodological aspects.
result.description: The report will contain the main outcomes of the revision process where the results of the assessments performed in other WPs by applying the methodological framework developed in WP1 will be analysed through a multicriteria and participatory approach. Strengths and weaknesses of the MF/AF systems studied and of the methodological framework adopted will be explored, identifying also potential effective improvements that could pave the way for steps further in the study and implementation of MF/AF systems. (M46)
